      Albert_Algo(Map map, SquareDriver driver, UltrasonicSensor usSensorFront, UltrasonicSensor usSensorBack, OdometryCorrection odocor)
      An algorithm that localises the robot inside a given maze.

        A method returning a conventional number for movement into a string.

      • applyCorrection

        public static void applyCorrection()
        Apply odometer correction

      • localize

        public int[] localize()
        Algorithm that tell the robot how to process data gotten from the maze and how to move to crash the cases in the most efficient way.
        Returns:
        The int array containing the heading, the column and the row of the robot

      • back_getFilteredData

        public static double back_getFilteredData()
        Eliminate data that is irrelevant and make an average with the remaining data.
        Returns:
        A filtered value of distance for the back sensor.

      • getBestRatio

        public static int getBestRatio(boolean canGoForward)
        Calculates if it is better to go forward left or right based on remaining possibilities. The ratio for the direction that is closest to 0.5 will be the direction chosen.
        Parameters:
        canGoForward -
        Returns:
        A number that is either 0, 1 or 3.

      • updatePositionsBack

        public static void updatePositionsBack()
        Treats the case when the back sensor is used
